ized consideration to applicants of all races. There is no policy, either de jure
or de facto,of automatic acceptance or rejection based on any single “soft”
variable. Unlike the program at issue in Gratz v. Bollinger[see below], the
Law  School  awards  no  mechanical,  predetermined  diversity  “bonuses”
based on race or ethnicity. . . .
